def jsonRes = messageExchange.getResponse().contentAsString
def jsonSlurper = new groovy.json.JsonSlurper(); def parse = jsonSlurper.parseText(jsonRes)
def promotionTypes = parse.promotionTypes log.info promotionTypes assert promotionTypes!=null
def promotionIds = parse.promotionIds log.info promotionIds assert promotionIds!=null
